data.name: Animated Berserker

data.flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

data.name: Blood To Ichor
data.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
data.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

data.name: Charge
data.text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
data.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

data.name: Choose Your Path
data.text: Discover a card.

data.name: Cursed Blade

data.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Defeat the Anomalies
data.text: Quest: Defeat\n8 Anomalies\nEffect:Summon Anomalous Rex.

data.name: Eternium Rover
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2_Armor.
data.flavor: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

data.name: Execute
data.text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.

data.name: Fire Plume's Heart
data.text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
data.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

data.name: I Know a Guy
data.text: Discover a Taunt minion.
data.flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

data.name: Iron Hide
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.
data.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

data.name: Molten Blade
data.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
data.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

data.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
data.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

data.name: Omega Assembly
data.text: [x]Discover a Mech. If you\nhave 10 Mana Crystals,\nkeep all 3 cards.
data.flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

data.name: Pawn
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Scarab
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Shield Slam
data.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
data.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

data.name: Town Crier
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
data.flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

data.name: Upgrade!
data.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
data.flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

data.name: Warbot
data.text: Has +1 Attack while damaged.
data.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

data.name: Whirlwind
data.text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
data.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

data.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
data.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

data.name: Armor Up!
data.text: Hero Power\nGain 2 Armor.

data.name: Armor Up!
data.text: Hero Power\nGain 2 Armor.

data.name: Armorsmith
data.text: Whenever a friendly minion_takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
data.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

data.name: Battle Rage
data.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
data.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

data.name: Big Red Button
data.text: [x]Hero Power\nActivate this turn's\nMech Suit power!

data.name: Bladed Gauntlet
data.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
data.flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

data.name: Bladestorm
data.text: Hero Power\n Deal $1 damage to all_minions.

data.name: Blast Shield
data.text: Hero Power\nGain 7 Armor.\nSwaps each turn.

data.name: Bolster
data.text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
data.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

data.name: Bring It On!
data.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
data.flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

data.name: Cleave
data.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\ntwo random enemy\nminions.
data.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

data.name: Commanding Shout
data.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
data.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

data.name: Cornered Sentry
data.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
data.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

data.name: Cruel Taskmaster
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
data.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

data.name: Dead Man's Hand
data.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
data.flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

data.name: Delivery Drone
data.text: Hero Power\nDiscover a Mech.\nSwaps_each_turn.

data.name: Drywhisker Armorer
data.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
data.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

data.name: Execute
data.text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
data.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

data.name: Explore Un'Goro
data.text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
data.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

data.name: Forge of Souls
data.text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
data.flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

data.name: Guard Bot
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Heroic Strike
data.text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn.
data.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

data.name: Hobart Grapplehammer
data.text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

data.name: KABOOM!
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $1 damage to all enemies. Swaps each turn.

data.name: Micro-Squad
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon three 1/1 Microbots.\nSwaps_each_turn.

data.name: Orc Warrior
data.text: Charge

data.name: Public Defender
data.text: Taunt
data.flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

data.name: Rampage
data.text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
data.flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

data.name: Redband Wasp
data.text: Rush\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
data.flavor: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

data.name: Revenge
data.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
data.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Rocket Boots
data.text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
data.flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

data.name: Slam
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
data.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

data.name: Sleep with the Fishes
data.text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
data.flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

data.name: Sparring Partner
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Give a\nminion Taunt.
data.flavor: Come at me, bro.

data.name: Stolen Goods
data.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
data.flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

data.name: Tank Up!
data.text: Hero Power\nGain 4 Armor.

data.name: Tank Up!
data.text: Hero Power\nGain 4 Armor.

data.text: [x]Hero Power\nSummon a 3/2 Orc.

data.name: The Horde
data.text: [x]Hero Power\nSummon a 3/3 Orc\nwith Charge.

data.name: Visions of Fate
data.text: Secret: When your opponent takes lethal damage... save him.

data.name: Visions of Hate
data.text: Secret: When both heroes have 15 or less Health, BRAWL!

data.name: Visions of Knowledge
data.text: Secret: When your opponent's hand has 9 or more cards, reduce the cost of all cards in both hands to (1).

data.name: Visions of the Amazon
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion with Battlecry, Summon a Mirror Image for both players.

data.name: Visions of the Assassin
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion with Stealth, All minions equip a dagger.

data.name: Visions of the Barbarian
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion with Charge, THUNDER FURY!

data.name: Visions of the Crusader
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion with Taunt, change all minions'\nattacks to 1.

data.name: Visions of the Necromancer
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a card with Deathrattle, destroy it.

data.name: Visions of the Sorcerer
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion with Spell Damage, Summon 2 Guardians.

data.name: Visions of Valor
data.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a Legendary minion, give all minions Windfury

data.name: Warpath
data.text: Echo\nDeal $1 damage to all_minions.
data.flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

data.name: Weapons Project
data.text: Each player equips a 2/3 Weapon and\ngains 6 Armor.
data.flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

data.name: Woodcutter's Axe
data.text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
data.flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

data.name: Zap Cannon
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $3 damage.\nSwaps each turn.

data.name: Bash
data.text: Deal $3 damage.\nGain 3 Armor.
data.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

data.name: Blazing Longsword
data.text: Also damages minions next to whomever your hero attacks.

data.name: Blood Warriors
data.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
data.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

data.name: Bloodsail Cultist
data.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
data.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

data.name: Bouncing Blade
data.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
data.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

data.name: Fierce Monkey
data.text: Taunt
data.flavor: Fierce monkey.  That funky monkey.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Fiery War Axe
data.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

data.name: Frothing Berserker
data.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

data.name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
data.text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

data.name: King's Defender
data.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
data.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

data.name: Kobold Barbarian
data.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
data.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

data.name: Mountainfire Armor
data.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
data.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

data.name: Ogre Warmaul
data.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
data.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

data.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
data.text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
data.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

data.name: Protect the King!
data.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
data.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Rabid Worgen
data.text: Rush
data.flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

data.name: Ravaging Ghoul
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
data.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

data.name: Reckless Flurry
data.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
data.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

data.name: Shield Block
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

data.name: Sulfuras
data.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 8_damage to a random enemy.'

data.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
data.text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
data.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

data.name: Warsong Commander
data.text: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack.
data.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

data.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2_weapon.
data.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

data.name: Axe Flinger
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
data.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Blood Razor
data.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
data.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

data.name: Bloodhoof Brave
data.text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
data.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

data.name: Brass Knuckles
data.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ngive a random minion in\nyour hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

data.name: Death's Bite
data.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
data.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Fatecleaver
data.text: [x]After this kills a minion,\ndestroy all copies of it\n(wherever they are).

data.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
data.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

data.name: Kor'kron Elite
data.text: Charge
data.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

data.name: Magnataur Alpha
data.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nhe attacks.
data.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

data.name: Militia Commander
data.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +3_Attack this turn.
data.flavor: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

data.name: Mortal Strike
data.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
data.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

data.name: Screwjank Clunker
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
data.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

data.name: Alley Armorsmith
data.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
data.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

data.name: Arcanite Reaper
data.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

data.name: Brawl
data.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
data.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

data.name: Darius Crowley
data.text: [x]Rush\nAfter this attacks and kills\na minion, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

data.name: Darius Crowley
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

data.name: Death Revenant
data.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
data.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

data.name: Direhorn Hatchling
data.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
data.flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

data.name: Direhorn Matriarch
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Dyn-o-matic
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions_except_Mechs.
data.flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

data.name: Festeroot Hulk
data.text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Tree puns arboring.

data.name: Fool's Bane
data.text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
data.flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Ironforge Portal
data.text: Gain 4 Armor.\nSummon a random\n4-Cost minion.
data.flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Siege Engine
data.text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Wintergrasp Keep's only weakness!

data.name: Sudden Genesis
data.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
data.flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

data.name: Supercollider
data.text: [x]After you attack a minion,\nforce it to attack one\nof its neighbors.
data.flavor: Boom's Second Law of Motion:\nHIT IT VERY HARD!

data.name: Tentacles for Arms
data.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
data.flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

data.name: Burrowing Mine
data.text: Casts When Drawn\nYou take 10 damage.

data.name: Deadly Arsenal
data.text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
data.flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

data.name: Draconic Herald
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a minion.\nGive it +3/+3 then put it on top of your deck.

data.name: Gather Your Party
data.text: Recruit a minion.
data.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

data.name: Gemstudded Golem
data.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
data.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

data.name: Iron Juggernaut
data.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
data.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

data.name: Ornery Direhorn
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Adapt.
data.flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

data.name: Runed Shield
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Golem.

data.name: Sea Reaver
data.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
data.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

data.name: Security Rover
data.text: [x]Whenever this minion\ntakes damage, summon a\n2/3 Mech with Taunt.
data.flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

data.name: Serrated Shield
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDeal $5 damage.

data.name: Shieldmaiden
data.text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor.
data.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

data.name: Spiked Shield
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nEquip a 5/2 weapon.

data.name: Tower Shield +10
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGain 10 more Armor.

data.name: Unidentified Shield
data.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
data.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

data.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
data.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
data.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

data.name: Beryllium Nullifier
data.text: Magnetic\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
data.flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

data.name: Blackhowl Gunspire
data.text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever
this minion takes damage,
deal 3 damage to a
random enemy.
data.flavor: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

data.name: Crush
data.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
data.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

data.name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
data.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
data.flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

data.name: Gorehowl
data.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
data.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

data.name: Greater Mithril Spellstone
data.text: Summon three 5/5 Mithril Golems.

data.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
data.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

data.name: Malkorok
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.
data.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

data.name: Mithril Spellstone
data.text: Summon two 5/5 Mithril Golems. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)

data.name: Obsidian Destroyer
data.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
data.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Tar Lord
data.text: Taunt\nHas +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
data.flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

data.name: Geosculptor Yip
data.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
data.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

data.name: Grommash Hellscream
data.text: Charge\nHas +6 Attack while damaged.
data.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

data.name: Rotface
data.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
data.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

data.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
data.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

data.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.

data.name: Shadowmourne
data.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.

data.name: Woecleaver
data.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
data.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

data.name: King Mosh
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
data.flavor: He's a terror at concerts.

data.name: The Boomship
data.text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
data.flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

data.name: Varian Wrynn
data.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.\nPut any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
data.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.
